alert.note: Alert for Salt Lake (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 30 at 7:52PM MDT until May 04 at 2:15AM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Salt Lake City UT has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Utah... Emigration Creek In Emigration Canyon and east bench of Salt Lake City affecting Salt Lake County. For Emigration Canyon and east bench of Salt Lake City...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO EARLY THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Emigration Creek In Emigration Canyon and east bench of Salt Lake City. * WHEN...From this evening to early Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 130.0 cfs, minor flood damage will impact homes and structures along Emigration Creek, including areas of the Hogle Zoo. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM MDT Sunday the flow was 130.0 cfs. - Forecast...The river will oscillate around flood stage through Thursday evening. - Flood flow is 130.0 cfs. &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Monday morning at 945 AM MDT.
